info.name: Project Free TV - Large Videos
info.description:
This enlarges videos on Project Free TV to 1000px wide. 

Try it out with my Modern style as well: http://userstyles.org/styles/96344/project-free-tv-modern
info.additionalInfo:
I combined my old enlarging styles into one single SUPER file. If you find any issues or sites that I didn't catch (ie. small video for a source) let me know.

Update(12/29): Cleaned Code.
Update(12/27): Fixed issue with captcha being covered occasionally.
Update(3/15/15): Applied fix for ".info" domain. Fixed some issues with a few sources.

Try it out with my Modern style as well: http://userstyles.org/styles/96344/project-free-tv-modern
